CustomField.formula: IF ( BillingCountry != 'Germany' && OR( BillingCountry = 'Austria', BillingCountry = 'Belgium', BillingCountry = 'Bulgaria', BillingCountry = 'Croatia', BillingCountry = 'Cyprus', BillingCountry = 'Czechia', BillingCountry = 'Denmark', BillingCountry = 'Estonia', BillingCountry = 'Finland', BillingCountry = 'France', BillingCountry = 'Greece', BillingCountry = 'Hungary', BillingCountry = 'Ireland', BillingCountry = 'Italy', BillingCountry = 'Latvia', BillingCountry = 'Lithuania', BillingCountry = 'Luxembourg', BillingCountry = 'Malta', BillingCountry = 'Netherlands', BillingCountry = 'Poland', BillingCountry = 'Portugal', BillingCountry = 'Romania', BillingCountry = 'Slovakia', BillingCountry = 'Slovenia', BillingCountry = 'Spain', BillingCountry = 'Sweden'), TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the Billing Country of the Account is within the EU, but not within Germany, this is automatically set to TRUE and Reverse Charge information is displayed on the billing PDFs.
CustomField.label: Reverse Charge?
